TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HitTestResult extends System.Object

span.span: Represents the results of a hit test.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示命中测试的结果，并作为从方法调用返回的对象公开 。The class represents the results of a hit test, and is exposed as the return object from a method call. 命中测试检查图表中的指定点，以确定图表元素是否位于该点。A hit test checks a specified point in the chart to determine if a chart element is located at that point. 如果检测到图表元素，则 使用类获取有关该图表元素的信息。If a chart element is detected, the class is used to obtain information about that chart element. 如果找到图表元素，则该 属性返回对图表元素的引用; 这是对象的唯一例外 ，在这种情况下，此属性的返回值为 `null` 。If a chart element is found, the property returns a reference to the chart element; the only exception to this being objects, in which case the return value of this property is `null`. 如果找到了数据点，则可以使用 属性来获取该数据点的索引，即中点的从零开始的索引 。If a data point is located, you can use the property to get the index of that data point; that is, the zero-based index of the point in the . 使用 属性可获取 该数据点的关联对象。Use the property to get the associated object for that data point. 和 属性用于获取图表元素（如果有）由命中测试返回的关联图表区和轴。The and properties are used to get the associated chart area and axis of the chart element - if any - returned by the hit test. 请注意， `null` 如果返回的图表元素没有关联的图表区或轴，则这些属性可能为。Note that these properties may be `null` if the returned chart element does not have an associated chart area or axis. 使用 属性可确定命中测试返回的图表元素的类型。Use the property to determine the type of the chart element returned by a hit test.

summary.span: 获取或设置可与命中测试返回的图表元素相关联的 对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the object that may be associated with a chart element returned by a hit test.

summary.span: 关联的 对象是否存在取决于在给定的位置是否检测到图表元素，以及所返回的图表元素的类型。

span.span: The presence of an associated object depends on whether a chart element was detected at the given location, and the type of chart element returned.

value.span: 如果在给定的位置检测到图表元素，则为一个 对象；否则为 。

span.span: An object, otherwise .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果命中测试返回的图表对象是与轴关联的对象（例如，滚动条元素、刻度线、网格线或条带线），则 属性将引用 与返回的图表对象关联的对象。If the chart object returned by the hit test is an object that is associated with an axis - for example, a scrollbar element, tick mark, grid line or strip line - the property will reference the object with which the returned chart object is associated. 否则，此属性将为 `null` 。Otherwise this property will be `null`. 请注意 ，可以显式调用方法，在这种情况下，图表元素可能位于指定位置，也可能不在指定位置。Note that the method can be called explicitly, in which case a chart element may or may not be at the specified location.

summary.span: 获取或设置可与命中测试返回的图表元素相关联的 对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the object that may be associated with a chart element returned by a hit test.

summary.span: 对象是否存在取决于在给定的位置是否检测到图表元素，以及所返回的图表元素的类型。

span.span: The presence of a object depends on whether a chart element was detected at the given location, and the type of chart element returned.

value.span: 如果在给定的位置检测到图表元素，则为一个 对象，否则为 。

span.span: A object, otherwise .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果命中测试返回了某个图表对象，则该 属性将引用 与返回的图表元素关联的对象。If a Chart object is returned by the hit test, the property will reference the object that is associated with the returned chart element. 如果命中测试未返回任何图表元素，则此属性的值将为 `null` 。If no chart element is returned by the hit test, the value of this property will be `null`. **注意**可以显式调用方法，在这种情况下，图表元素可能位于指定位置，也可能不在指定位置。**Note** The method can be called explicitly, in which case a chart element may or may not be at the specified location.

summary.span: 获取或设置命中测试返回的对象（如果有）。

span.span: Gets or sets the object, if any, returned by a hit test.

value.span: 一个类型为 的对象，否则为 。

span.span: An object of type , otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果图表元素位于命中测试所检查的点，则此属性将引用该图表元素，否则此属性的值将为 `null` 。If a chart element is located at the point that is checked by the hit test, this property will reference that chart element, otherwise the value of this property will be `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果命中测试返回了数据点，则此属性将仍返回 `null` 。If a data point is returned by the hit test, this property will still return a `null`. 若要获取有关数据点的信息，请改用 和 属性。To obtain information about the data point, use the and properties instead.

summary.span: 获取或设置命中测试返回的数据点（如果有）的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of a data point, if any, returned by a hit test.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示命中测试返回的数据点的索引。

span.span: An value that represents the index of a data point returned by a hit test.
The default value is negative one (-1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数据点位于命中测试所检查的位置，则该 属性将返回该数据点的从零开始的索引，否则将返回一个 ( 为1的负) 。If a data point is at the location that is checked by a hit test, the property will return the zero-based index of that data point, otherwise it will return a negative one (-1). 所有数据点都存储在中 ，后者将公开为 对象的集合属性 ; 的索引 是从零开始的。All data points are stored in a , which is exposed as the collection property of a object; the index of the is zero-based. 使用 属性可确定数据点所属的序列。Use the property to determine the series to which the data point belongs.

span.span: Gets or sets the associated series of a data point, if any, returned by a hit test.

value.span: 命中测试返回的数据点所属的 。

span.span: The that a data point returned by a hit test belongs to.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数据点位于命中测试所检查的位置，则此属性将引用该 数据点所属的对象。If a data point is at the location checked by a hit test, this property will reference the object that the data point belongs to. 如果命中测试未返回任何数据点，则此属性的值将为 `null` 。If no data point is returned by the hit test, the value of this property will be `null`. 若要确定返回的数据点的索引，请使用 属性。To determine the index of a returned data point, use the property.
